title: Sneaky  - Good Marketing Strategies with Rich Schefren
itunes:title: Sneaky  - Good Marketing Strategies with Rich Schefren
description:
The pandemic may have shifted many businesses online in recent years, but Rich Schefren had been virtually scaling and growing businesses well before the world went remote. 

 

Rich Schefren is the coach for Internet gurus and the Founder and President of Strategic Profits, an online business consulting firm. As an “Internet Marketing pioneer,” Rich is responsible for groundbreaking innovations such as the first automated webinar, the first viral free business report and has worked to popularize online business coaching since founding his company in 2005. 

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach picks Rich’s brain about how he creates launches and popularizes his marketing strategies. He also makes some suggestions for Zach to ramp up client acquisitions. Listen in for an episode that will dial in your business’ growth plan. 

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/rich-schefren
 
Get More Involved: 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
